episodes.name: The Game Is Afoot
episodes.overview: Twenty contestants arrive at a castle in Scotland to play the ultimate murder mystery game; the Traitors are chosen as the prize pot starts building, but one Faithful player won't make it through the night when the Traitors plot their first murder.

episodes.name: Buried Alive
episodes.overview: With suspicion rife after the first murder, the Traitors attempt to keep their cover; the mission sees some players meet an early grave; the first player is banished at the round table.

episodes.name: Murder They Wrote
episodes.overview: A surprising victim is next on the Traitors' murder list; the bells toll to make money for the prize pot; another player is banished in a fiery round table; one Faithful makes a dramatic discovery.

episodes.name: Life or Death Situation
episodes.overview: Cracks start to show in the treacherous trio as the pressure of the game begins to weigh on one of them; home truths are told in the Carnival of Chaos; two more players are murdered and banished.

episodes.name: Getting Away With Murder
episodes.overview: One Traitor brings suspicion on themselves; an ecclesiastical mission gives the players a chance to raise the prize pot over $100,000; murder and banishment hit two very unexpected victims.

episodes.name: Suspicion and Sabotage
episodes.overview: The players are thrown a vital lifeline, but for three of them, being on trial puts them even closer to murder; Kate rallies against the others during a mission that pushes everyone to the limit; suspicions mount on one Traitor in particular.

episodes.name: The Mask Is Slipping
episodes.overview: A Traitor's mask is at risk of slipping, with suspicions flared at the round table; the mission sees the ghosts of former players return to the castle; the ultimate plot twist is revealed in the Traitors' turret.

episodes.name: Cabins in the Woods
episodes.overview: One player has the ultimate decision to make; a tall tale brings suspicion on one Traitor; the players engage in a harrowing mission while on a trip full of creepy cabins; the most brutal round table so far.

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: During the penultimate day in the castle, the players can add to the current prize pot of $168,800; with the end in sight, alliances are broken and trust between the Traitors is questioned.

episodes.name: The Grand Finale
episodes.overview: On the final day, the players are steps away from the prize money; the ultimate mission and the final round table banishing occur; the surviving players gather at "The Fire of Truth," where either the Traitors or the Faithful will win the prize pot.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Alan Cumming and the cast of "The Traitors" settle the score on all of the deceptions, murders, banishments and treachery in a reunion hosted by Andy Cohen.

episodes.name: Betrayers, Fakes and Fraudsters
episodes.overview: The ultimate game of deception is back as an all-star cast descends on the Scottish Highlands. The Traitors are chosen, but there's a twist. The players start building the prize pot for the Faithful to share or the Traitors to steal.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Dark Side
episodes.overview: Treachery continues in the Scottish Highlands as the Traitors attempt to complete their lineup and commit their first murder. The mission to build the prize pot reveals some hard truths, and the first player is banished from the game.

episodes.name: Murder in Plain Sight
episodes.overview: The Traitors are given a daunting task for their next murder. A dark mission ensures the players keep working on the prize pot. The Faithful continue to attempt to banish one of the Traitors.

episodes.name: The Funeral
episodes.overview: Murder most foul continues, but this time the Traitors must kill in plain sight; a deadly mission sees a player take their last breath in the game; a dramatic round table leaves the next banishment hanging in the balance.

episodes.name: A Killer Move
episodes.overview: Alan's castle in the Scottish Highlands welcomes a new arrival; the Faithful have a cunning plan to fight back; one of the Traitors is in the hot seat.

episodes.name: Backstab and Betrayal
episodes.overview: A breakdown in trust between the traitors which leads to back-stabbing, vote-flipping, and the pressure to recruit one of the faithful over to the dark side.

episodes.name: Blood on Their Hands
episodes.overview: Death is still in the cards as The Traitors discover whether their attempt at seduction has been successful. The Faithful gun for another Traitor, but their plans may not pay off. Alan has a deadly surprise for all the players.

episodes.name: Knives at Dawn
episodes.overview: As the Faithful's numbers continue to decrease, the Traitors find their backs against the wall; a special guest appears during a beastly mission that proves to be too much for some players; a Faithful is given an ultimatum that could be fatal.

episodes.name: A Game of Death
episodes.overview: With only a few more days for the Traitors to remain undetected and win the game, a Faithful and a Traitor go head-to-head; one Faithful must decide their fate after being given an ultimatum; shots are fired during the mission.

episodes.name: The Weight of Deceit
episodes.overview: With only seven players remaining in the competition, the Faithful seem to be closing in as doubt about one Traitor spreads among even their most ardent supporters.

episodes.name: One Final Hurdle
episodes.overview: The toughest mission yet occurs on land, air and sea, with the Faithful or Traitors winning it all.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The cast of “The Traitors” airs their grievances regarding murders, banishments and treachery.

episodes.name: Let Battle Commence
episodes.overview: A new all-star cast arrives in Scotland; before the Traitors are chosen, a decision must be made.

episodes.name: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Cold
episodes.overview: Three new players enter the game; the Traitors draw their first blood, and a player is banished.

episodes.name: Nail in a Coffin
episodes.overview: The Traitors must meet outside of their tower to commit their next murder in plain sight.

episodes.name: I Will Bury You Under the Sand
episodes.overview: A dramatic murder casts suspicion on two Faithfuls; a Traitor must stay out of the spotlight.

episodes.name: All This Murderous Power
episodes.overview: With their trust shaken, the Traitors must decide how to move forward; a dangerous move threatens to backfire, and the coffin theory surfaces once more; at the round table, the limits of an alliance within the Faithful are tested.

episodes.name: A Dysfunctional Family
episodes.overview: With tensions in their tower at a breaking point, the Traitors must still work together; two dangerous Faithfuls start to hatch a plan, but it could backfire.

episodes.name: Til Death Us Do Part
episodes.overview: The Faithful are circling as they try to catch their prey; at night, the Traitors must commit their murder face-to-face in the most dramatic send-off the castle has ever seen.

episodes.name: A B**** Is Lying
episodes.overview: The Faithful seek to close the lid on the coffin theory; an alliance of gamers sparks suspicion.

episodes.name: A Silent Assassin
episodes.overview: The Faithful must think like a Traitor in the mission; a rivalry comes to a head at the round table.

episodes.name: The Power of the Seer
episodes.overview: One Faithful faces a big decision; the mission offers the players a chance to win a great power.

episodes.name: The Day of Reckoning Is Upon Us
episodes.overview: With a big announcement and the final mission, either the Faithful or Traitors claim the prize pot.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: The cast of "The Traitors" air their grievances regarding murders, banishments and treachery.
